text: Daylight and champian discovers not more! This is

speaker: MALVOLIO

speaker: MALVOLIO

speaker: MALVOLIO

speaker: MALVOLIO

speaker: MALVOLIO

speaker: MALVOLIO
text: Jove, I thank thee! I will smile. I will do everything

speaker: MALVOLIO
text: that thou wilt have me.

speaker: FABIAN
text: I will not give my part of this sport for a

speaker: FABIAN
text: pension of thousands to be paid from the Sophy.

speaker: TOBY
text: I could marry this wench for this device.

text: So could I too.

text: And ask no other dowry with her but such

speaker: TOBY
text: another jest.

speaker: TOBY

speaker: MARIA
text: be so unsuitable to her disposition, being addicted

speaker: MARIA
text: to a melancholy as she is, that it cannot

speaker: MARIA

speaker: MARIA
